parameters.name: ArrayDataIn
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles containing 3 * points (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IFreePointCurveFeatureData.ISetPointArray
description: Sets the list of X, Y, Z coordinates for the points for this free-point curve.
signature:
void ISetPointArray( 
   System.Int32
FeatCount
,
   ref System.Double
ArrayDataIn
)

parameters.name: ArrayDataIn
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles containing 3 * points (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
The ArrayDataIn argument is an array of doubles containing 3 * points:
[
x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, ...
]
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
